author: gwendal.ledivechen
title: African Blockchain Centre for Devs
description:
Lack of trained Cardano developers worldwide
Acknowledgment/credibility of African devs
African brains trot to the Western countries
solution:
Train elite Cardano devs in Africa
Establish the best Cardano solution provider in Africa
Build technical elite of the future Africa
experience: Joshua, Gwen and the ABCD teams run the initiative for a year and already assembled a first cohort of 14 promising blockchain developers.
